1370: Trueb was born in Kerckstraet in 1370.
Got married to Thedwi at age 18 in 1370.
Had a son with Thedwi, Clemmam, at age 18.
1371: Had a daughter with Thedwi, Gloria, at age 19.
1373: Had a daughter with Thedwi, Reynildis, at age 21.
Lost son Clemmam when Clemmam was 4 years old.
1376: Had a daughter with Thedwi, Jute, at age 24.
1377: Had a daughter with Thedwi, Vreile, at age 25.
1378: Had a daughter with Thedwi, Moerseil, at age 26.
1388: Lost daughter Moerseil when Moerseil was 11 years old.
1396: Lost daughter Reynildis when Reynildis was 23 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
